div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 148px; height: 1px; padding-top: 143px; margin-left: 1px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Redis Cluster with 1 Primary + 2 replica nodes
Automatic disk backup

ALB acting as a
round robin
